title: Great Set!!!
text: Love this brand and this set. Nice one to mix and match and layer up or down depending on the weather. Jelly and the pug always has great quality and this set delivers as expected on quality. It does fit true to size but will be bigger when it arrives as it is 100% cotton and will shrink when washed and dried. It is also a swing dress so the cut is bigger and roomy if you expect a more fitted look this is not the dress style for you! But its adorable and we love it!
